This unique attraction is a great destination at any time of year and a fantastic opportunity to also see the Musée de l'Hôtel des postes, with its famous clock, post office and much more!

Museum, historic/archeological site Add to my planner

Musée Laurier (LHN Maison Wilfrid-Laurier) / Musée de l'Hôtel des Postes

Region City Centre-du-Québec Victoriaville

Step into this lavish Victorian residence built in 1876, where you'll feel like time has stopped. This unique attraction is a great destination at any time of year and a fantastic opportunity to also see the Musée de l'Hôtel des postes, with its famous clock, post office and much more!
